properties.name: text
properties.sample: Exercitationem pariatur cumque voluptate quod. Sapiente doloribus ipsa debitis nostrum aliquam accusamus praesentium. Culpa nisi magni amet reiciendis pariatur.

properties.name: plot
properties.sample: An angel must show a mother the true meaning of Christmas. It's not just presents and materialistic things, but the people she cares about.

properties.name: fullplot
properties.sample: From opposing ethnicities, Ngabo and Sangwa are tested when old-timers warn, "Hutus and Tutsis should not be friends." An intense and inspiring portrait of youth in Rwanda, 'Munyurangabo' features Poet Laureate Edouard Uwayo delivering a moving poem about his healing country. Rwanda. Kinyarwanda with English subtitles.

properties.name: consensus
properties.sample: Though more mainstream than other Coen films, there are still funny oddball touches, and Clooney and Zeta-Jones sizzle like old-time movie stars.
